articles.description: Four weeks ago, Saints coach Sean Payton led everyone to believe that Jameis Winston, not Taysom Hill, would replace Drew Brees as the team’s starting quarterback. Hill got the start, along with three more. Today, Payton once again has demonstrated his brilli…

articles.author: Max Olson
articles.title: How Matt Campbell built Iowa State into a power his way - The Athletic
articles.description: Iowa State's head coach has been relentless in preaching process as the Cyclones went from bottom-feeder to Big 12 frontrunner.
articles.content: In his first team meeting at Iowa State soon after landing in his new home on Nov. 29, 2015, Matt Campbell laid out an ambitious vision. The 36-year-old head coach made the argument that greatness wa… [+652 chars]
